offers.name: 0% APR for 12 Months
offers.disclaimer: 0% APR for 12 months on purchases of $299 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 12 months.

offers.name: 0% APR for 18 Months
offers.disclaimer: 0% APR for 18 months on purchases of $500 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 18 months.

offers.name: 0% APR for 24 Months
offers.disclaimer: 0% APR for 24 months on purchases of $750 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 24 months.

offers.name: Standard 12 Month Plan
offers.disclaimer: Standard APR of 19.99% applies. Minimum monthly payments required.

offers.name: Standard 24 Month Plan
offers.disclaimer: Standard APR of 22.99% applies. Minimum monthly payments required.

offers.name: CareCredit 6 Months No Interest
offers.disclaimer: No Interest if paid in full in 6 months on purchases of $200 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 6 months.

offers.name: CareCredit 12 Months No Interest
offers.disclaimer: No Interest if paid in full in 12 months on purchases of $300 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 12 months.

offers.name: CareCredit 18 Months No Interest
offers.disclaimer: No Interest if paid in full in 18 months on purchases of $500 or more. Interest will be charged from the purchase date if the promotional balance is not paid in full within 18 months.

offers.name: CareCredit Extended Payment Plan
offers.disclaimer: 17.90% APR applies to extended payment plans. Minimum monthly payments required.
